item.title: TextBlock for Green Shoes
item.dc:creator: ashbb
item.content:encoded:
Implemented the following methods: banner, title, subtitle, tagline, caption, para, inscription, code, del, em, ins, strong, sub, sup.

And added new methods bg and fg for convenience to use Pango magic!

Look at github repo. ;-)

Cheers,
ashbb
